briefTitle: Communicating Objective Risk for Personalized Decision Making About Mammography
officialTitle: Communicating Objective Risk for Personalized Decision Making About Mammography
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Behavioral intentions to get a mammogram
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Adult women between the ages of 35 and 49 will be invited to participate in this study.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Women who have been previously diagnosed with breast cancer or have tested positive for the breast cancer gene will not be included.
